name: SanibelJournal
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
My wife and I bought a home on Sanibel in December of 2021. We watched from New England with horror as Hurricane Ian wandered through the Caribbean to make a nearly direct hit on the island on September 28, 2022. Now comes the rebuilding. Drawing on 13 years as host of my Kindle Chronicles podcast and two years with my weekday Morning Journal flash briefing, I will bring you conversations with others who love Sanibel and are working to make it better than ever after Ian.

With this flash briefing enabled, just say "Alexa, flash briefing" to hear a new episode each Wednesday, released at noon Eastern Time.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
